title: WE DID IT BOYS. YASUO NERFS INCOMING AYEEEEEEEEEEEEEE
body:
''He is looking a bit out of line yeah. We'll likely trim a bit of power sometime in the next couple of patches. Not sure what yet, one of the first things we'll look at though is whether tank builds are inappropriately effective.'' - Meddler


WE DID IT BOYS.

replies.body: What from Meddler's comment makes you think people bitching on the boards had any impact?  To me it looks like he was looking at statistics, not whiny little players.

> [{quoted}](name=redniwediS,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7bERljoA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-03T22:14:24.881+0000)
>
> What from Meddler's comment makes you think people bitching on the boards had any impact?  To me it looks like he was looking at statistics, not whiny little players.

Who cares. Its happening either way.

You're right, Yasuo is getting nerfed regardless of the validity of your posts.

You did nothing.

> [{quoted}](name=redniwediS,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7bERljoA,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-08-03T22:20:06.177+0000)
>
> You're right, Yasuo is getting nerfed regardless of the validity of your posts.
> 
> You did nothing.

Why are you so angry for.
What makes you think correcting someone who is wrong is anger?
Spoken like a true Yasuo main.

Oh yes, look at my very large number of Yasuo games.  Make sure to not look at the fact that they total at 0, and that I'm a Garen main.

Then again I can't expect people to be smart and do their research online.  People would rather hide in their own little world where everyone who disagrees with them is part of some group who's opinion can be fully discounted.
Oh, you mean the little world where you can talk shit and not get hit? Sit down boy.
You lost your right to tell me to sit down when you straight up made something up and got called on it.

You're just here to argue for the hell of it, Just sit the fuck down.

I said spoken like a true Yasuo main. Because that's what they say. Did I say you were a Yasuo main? No. I made a statement implying that's what Yasuo mains say.

So your defense is that you're stating a useless generalization?  Classy.

We all know what calling someone a champion main means.  It's derogatory and meant only to belittle anything they say due to a supposed bias toward their champion.

You were not making a generalization up there.  You were throwing out a blanket accusation in order to belittle what I said.  Nevermind that it had absolute jack shit to do with the content of my post.

"They" don't agree on everything.  "They" don't always try to defend their champion from criticism.  Most importantly "they" don't all say "What makes you think correcting someone who is wrong is anger?".  That is not a phrase that is stereotypically bound to Yasuo mains.  Neither is pointing out that an OP is ignoring facts and acting happy for no real reason.

As I said before you lost your right to tell me to sit down when you got caught making up nonsense.  No amount of trying to explain it away will cover that up.  We all understand how those phrases actually work, so if you don't like it you can simply stop replying.  It's not like this thread is going to last a while anyway.
Do you understand what the internet is?
Do you understand that you got wrecked?  To take a page from your own play book; sit down.

> [{quoted}](name=1 800 Top Lane,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7bERljoA,comment-id=000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-08-03T22:26:06.630+0000)
>
> Spoken like a true Yasuo main.

^
Nope.  I don't even own Yasuo, so no up arrow for you.

because listening to whiny players is a terrible idea.
glad meddler doesn't
Doesn't matter, you'll still whine about him until he will be an oversized minion.

They're not going to gut him, everything you hate about him will still be there.

I'll bookmark this so i can type laughing out loud in your face after the "nerf".

why did you edit out the part about this nerf being targeted at tank yasuo

You realise he might get a compensation buff to normal glass yasuo right???
Well I'm fine with glass yasuo.  It isn't too difficult to make him go pop.

It isn't a nerf if you fully read or watched anything in regards to this. It is true they want to not have the tank build with yas like they did with ekko and now Akali. What they want to do is make him more damage like he is built to do.  Talks if maybe making that work is lowering his q damage.  At this point it is true he us being looked at by riot in upcoming patches but nothing is set in stone or fully released yet. On the other hand you also should take in mind that Yas has always been a challenge to balance for riot upon his release. His overall kit makes him hard to balance every time they put any attention on him. So saying I am sure something will be addressed to Yas but what? Even if so it us Yas and he will always find that build to punish you.
